text: ABC has announced that Michael Strahan is leaving Good Morning America and will team up with The View co - host Sara Haines to host a new third hour of the news show called GMA Day. Sources say that the move comes after Strahan got upset over the addition of future baseball Hall - Of - Famer Alex Rodriguez as a GMA contributor. “ Tell your friends, tell your family, tell the whole town, shout it from the rooftops, ” Strahan tweeted. “ Starting September 10th @ sarahaines and I will be hosting the 3rd hour of @ GMA! # gmaday # gma ” Strahan has been a popular part of the morning news show since he left his job as co - host of Live! with Kelly Ripa in 2016.
